016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import io.micronaut.core.io.socket.SocketUtils;
019import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
020import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.MavenDependency;
021import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ModuleIdentifier;
022import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerFactory;
023import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerSettings;
024import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerUtils;
025import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.TestResourcesClasspath;
026import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
027import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
028import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
029import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
030import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
031import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
032import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
033import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
034import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
035
036import java.io.File;
037import java.io.IOException;
038import java.nio.file.Files;
039import java.nio.file.Path;
040import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
041import java.util.Collections;
042import java.util.HashMap;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import java.util.UUID;
047import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
048import java.util.stream.Stream;
049
050import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.toClasspathFiles;
051import static java.util.stream.Stream.concat;
052
053/**
054 * Utility class to stop Test Resources service.
055 */
056public class TestResourcesHelper {
057
058    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES = "test-resources.properties";
059    private static final String PORT_FILE_NAME = "test-resources-port.txt";
060
061    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX = "micronaut.test.resources.";
062
063    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_SERVER_URI = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.uri";
064    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_ACCESS_TOKEN = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.access.token";
065    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_CLIENT_READ_TIMEOUT = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.client.read.timeout";
066
067    private final boolean enabled;
068
069    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
070
071    private final boolean shared;
072
073    private final File buildDirectory;
074
075    private final Log log;
076
077    private Integer explicitPort;
078
079    private Integer clientTimeout;
080
081    private Integer serverIdleTimeoutMinutes;
082
083    private MavenProject mavenProject;
084
085    private DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
086
087    private ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
088
089    private String testResourcesVersion;
090
091    private boolean classpathInference;
092
093    private List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies;
094
095    private String sharedServerNamespace;
096
097    private boolean debugServer;
098
099    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled,
100                               boolean shared,
101                               File buildDirectory,
102                               Integer explicitPort,
103                               Integer clientTimeout,
104                               Integer serverIdleTimeoutMinutes,
105                               MavenProject mavenProject,
106                               MavenSession mavenSession,
107                               DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService,
108                               ToolchainManager toolchainManager,
109                               String testResourcesVersion,
110                               boolean classpathInference,
111                               List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies,
112                               String sharedServerNamespace,
113                               boolean debugServer) {
114        this(mavenSession, enabled, shared, buildDirectory);
115        this.explicitPort = explicitPort;
116        this.clientTimeout = clientTimeout;
117        this.serverIdleTimeoutMinutes = serverIdleTimeoutMinutes;
118        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
119        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
120        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
121        this.testResourcesVersion = testResourcesVersion;
122        this.classpathInference = classpathInference;
123        this.testResourcesDependencies = testResourcesDependencies;
124        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
125        this.debugServer = debugServer;
126    }
127
128    public TestResourcesHelper(MavenSession mavenSession, boolean enabled, boolean shared, File buildDirectory) {
129        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
130        this.enabled = enabled;
131        this.shared = shared;
132        this.buildDirectory = buildDirectory;
133        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
134    }
135
136    private boolean isKeepAlive() {
137        boolean hasKeepAliveFile = Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile());
138        return hasKeepAliveFile || isStartExplicitlyInvoked();
139    }
140
141    private boolean isStartExplicitlyInvoked() {
142        return mavenSession.getGoals()
143            .stream()
144            .anyMatch(goal -> goal.equals("mn:" + StartTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME));
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Starts the Test Resources Service.
149     */
150    public void start() throws MojoExecutionException {
151        if (!enabled) {
152            return;
153        }
154        try {
155            doStart();
156        } catch (Exception e) {
157            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to start test resources server", e);
158        }
159    }
160
161    private void doStart() throws IOException {
162        var accessToken = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
163        Path buildDir = buildDirectory.toPath();
164        Path serverSettingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
165        var serverStarted = new AtomicBoolean(false);
166        var serverFactory = new DefaultServerFactory(log, toolchainManager, mavenSession, serverStarted, testResourcesVersion, debugServer);
167        Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = startOrConnectToExistingServer(accessToken, buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory, serverFactory);
168        if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent()) {
169            ServerSettings serverSettings = optionalServerSettings.get();
170            if (shared) {
171                if (sharedServerNamespace != null) {
172                    log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode with the namespace: " + sharedServerNamespace);
173                    //Copy the server settings to the default location so that TR Client can find it
174                    Path projectSettingsDirectory = serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
175                    Files.createDirectories(projectSettingsDirectory);
176
177                    Path source = serverSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES);
178                    Path target = projectSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES);
179                    Files.copy(source, target, StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
180                } else {
181                    log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode");
182                }
183            }
184            setSystemProperties(serverSettings);
185            if (serverStarted.get()) {
186                if (isKeepAlive()) {
187                    log.info("Micronaut Test Resources service is started in the background. To stop it, run the following command: 'mvn mn:" + StopTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME + "'");
188                }
189            } else {
190                // A server was already listening, which means it was running before
191                // the build was started, so we put a file to indicate to the stop
192                // mojo that it should not stop the server.
193                Path keepalive = getKeepAliveFile();
194                // Test is because we may be running in watch mode
195                if (!Files.exists(keepalive)) {
196                    Files.write(keepalive, "true".getBytes());
197                    Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() -> {
198                        // Make sure that if the build is interrupted, e.g using CTRL+C, the keepalive file is deleted
199                        try {
200                            deleteKeepAliveFile();
201                        } catch (MojoExecutionException e) {
202                            // ignore, we're in a shutdown hook
203                        }
204                    }));
205                }
206            }
207        }
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * Computes the system properties to set for the test resources client to be able to connect to the server.
212     *
213     * @param serverSettings The server settings
214     * @return The system properties
215     */
216    public Map<String, String> computeSystemProperties(ServerSettings serverSettings) {
217        var systemProperties = new HashMap<String, String>(3);
218        String uri = String.format("http://localhost:%d", serverSettings.getPort());
219        systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_SERVER_URI, uri);
220        serverSettings.getAccessToken().ifPresent(accessToken -> systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_ACCESS_TOKEN, accessToken));
221        serverSettings.getClientTimeout().ifPresent(timeout -> systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_CLIENT_READ_TIMEOUT, String.valueOf(timeout)));
222        return systemProperties;
223    }
224
225    private void setSystemProperties(ServerSettings serverSettings) {
226        computeSystemProperties(serverSettings).forEach(System::setProperty);
227    }
228
229    private Optional<ServerSettings> startOrConnectToExistingServer(String accessToken, Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory, ServerFactory serverFactory) {
230        try {
231            return Optional.ofNullable(
232                ServerUtils.startOrConnectToExistingServer(
233                    explicitPort,
234                    buildDir.resolve(PORT_FILE_NAME),
235                    serverSettingsDirectory,
236                    accessToken,
237                    resolveServerClasspath(),
238                    clientTimeout,
239                    serverIdleTimeoutMinutes,
240                    serverFactory
241                )
242            );
243        } catch (Exception e) {
244            log.error("Error starting Micronaut Test Resources service", e);
245            return Optional.empty();
246        }
247    }
248
249    private List<File> resolveServerClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
250        List<MavenDependency> applicationDependencies = Collections.emptyList();
251        if (classpathInference) {
252            applicationDependencies = getApplicationDependencies();
253        }
254        Stream<Artifact> serverDependencies =
255            TestResourcesClasspath.inferTestResourcesClasspath(applicationDependencies, testResourcesVersion)
256                .stream()
257                .map(DependencyResolutionService::testResourcesDependencyToAetherArtifact);
258
259        List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> extraDependencies =
260            testResourcesDependencies != null ? testResourcesDependencies : Collections.emptyList();
261
262        Stream<Artifact> extraDependenciesStream = extraDependencies.stream()
263            .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact);
264
265        Stream<Artifact> artifacts = concat(serverDependencies, extraDependenciesStream);
266
267        var resolutionResult = dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(artifacts, true);
268        var filteredArtifacts = resolutionResult.stream()
269            .filter(result -> {
270                var artifact = result.getArtifact();
271                var id = new ModuleIdentifier(artifact.getGroupId(), artifact.getArtifactId());
272                return TestResourcesClasspath.isDependencyAllowedOnServerClasspath(id);
273            })
274            .toList();
275        return toClasspathFiles(filteredArtifacts);
276    }
277
278    private List<MavenDependency> getApplicationDependencies() {
279        return this.mavenProject.getDependencies().stream()
280            .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToTestResourcesDependency)
281            .toList();
282    }
283
284    /**
285     * Contains the logic to stop the Test Resources Service.
286     *
287     * @param quiet Whether to perform logging or not.
288     */
289    public void stop(boolean quiet) throws MojoExecutionException {
290        if (!enabled) {
291            return;
292        }
293        if (isKeepAlive()) {
294            log("Keeping Micronaut Test Resources service alive", quiet);
295            return;
296        }
297        try {
298            Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = ServerUtils.readServerSettings(getServerSettingsDirectory());
299            if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent() && isServerStarted(optionalServerSettings.get().getPort())) {
300                log("Shutting down Micronaut Test Resources service", quiet);
301                doStop();
302            } else {
303                log("Cannot find Micronaut Test Resources service settings, server may already be shutdown", quiet);
304            }
305        } catch (Exception e) {
306            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to stop test resources server", e);
307        }
308    }
309
310    private static boolean isServerStarted(int port) {
311        if (System.getProperty("test.resources.internal.server.started") != null) {
312            return Boolean.getBoolean("test.resources.internal.server.started");
313        } else {
314            return !SocketUtils.isTcpPortAvailable(port);
315        }
316    }
317
318    private void log(String message, boolean quiet) {
319        if (quiet) {
320            if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
321                log.debug(message);
322            }
323        } else {
324            log.info(message);
325        }
326    }
327
328    private void doStop() throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
329        try {
330            Path settingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
331            ServerUtils.stopServer(settingsDirectory);
332        } finally {
333            deleteKeepAliveFile();
334        }
335    }
336
337    private void deleteKeepAliveFile() throws MojoExecutionException {
338        if (Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile())) {
339            try {
340                Files.delete(getKeepAliveFile());
341            } catch (IOException e) {
342                throw new MojoExecutionException("Failed to delete keepalive file", e);
343            }
344        }
345    }
346
347    private Path getServerSettingsDirectory() {
348        if (shared) {
349            return ServerUtils.getDefaultSharedSettingsPath(sharedServerNamespace);
350        }
351        return serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
352    }
353
354    private Path getKeepAliveFile() {
355        var tmpDir = Path.of(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir"));
356        return tmpDir.resolve("keepalive-" + mavenSession.getRequest().getBuilderId());
357    }
358
359    private Path serverSettingsDirectoryOf(Path buildDir) {
360        return buildDir.resolve("../.micronaut/test-resources");
361    }
362
363    /**
364     * @param sharedServerNamespace The shared server namespace (if any).
365     */
366    public void setSharedServerNamespace(String sharedServerNamespace) {
367        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
368    }
369}
